com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet

Interface RequestContextListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequestContextListener, DestinationsRequestContextListener, ScpNeoAuditLogRequestContextListener, ScpNeoDestinationsRequestContextListener, ScpNeoSecretStoreRequestContextListener, TenantRequestContextListener, UserRequestContextListener

    public interface RequestContextListener
    Enables listening to lifecycle events of a RequestContext. RequestContextListeners are usually invoked by a RequestContextServletFilter or RequestContextExecutor.

    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        Returns the priority that defines the order in which listeners are invoked. Smaller priorities are invoked earlier during context initialization and invoked later (reversed initialization order) during context destruction. Negative number should not be used as they are reserved for internal use. If there no requirements with respect to the invocation order, it is suggested to use 0 as default.

      • requestContextInitialized

        void requestContextInitialized(RequestContext requestContext)
        Invoked when initializing a RequestContext.

      • requestContextDestroyed

        void requestContextDestroyed(RequestContext requestContext)
        Invoked when destroying a RequestContext.
